pullrequest.title: Integration tests: clean up paths and some timing

content.raw:
lots of flakiness started when I split CI duties between two machines. gazebo has an 8-core machine with a spinning disk, while ignition jobs use a 4-core machine with an SSD. So the ignition flakiness might be due to lack of CPU?

we have another 8-core machine with a spinning disk that is sitting mostly idle (just used for bottle building on el_capitan, and we have a macbook pro we could use for CI, but I haven't been able to get jenkins to work with it
